text: Arthur Bruce McDonald (born August 29, 1943) is a Canadian astrophysicist. McDonald is the director of the Sudbury Neutrino Observatory Institute. He holds the Gordon and Patricia Gray Chair in Particle Astrophysics at Queen's University in Kingston, Ontario. McDonald was awarded the 2015 Nobel Prize in Physics with Japanese physicist Takaaki Kajita. ==References== ==Other websites== * Arthur B. McDonald and Oscillating Neutrinos * Arthur B.
